articles.title: Yorkshire racism scandal finally forces those in power to feel the heat
articles.description: It has taken far too long for cricket’s protective wall to crumble but Azeem Rafiq’s determination to be heard is now encouraging others to come forward, writes Vithushan Ehantharajah
articles.content: Consider 5 November 2021 as day one. Not merely three years since Azeem Rafiq first made allegations of racism and bullying at Yorkshire, approaching the club with his grievances that initially went … [+7026 chars]
